translations.userSettings.apiKeyCreatedDesc: Copy your new API key now
translations.userSettings.apiKeyWarning: This is the only time you will see this key. Please copy it and store it securely.
translations.userSettings.apiKeysDesc: Manage API keys for programmatic access
translations.userSettings.avatarHint: Upload an image to use as your avatar
translations.userSettings.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself...
translations.userSettings.createApiKeyDesc: Generate a new API key for automation
translations.userSettings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
translations.userSettings.deleteApiKeyDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
translations.userSettings.deleteWarning1: All your templates will be permanently deleted
translations.userSettings.deleteWarning2: All your workflows and executions will be removed
translations.userSettings.deleteWarning3: Your profile and settings will be erased
translations.userSettings.deviceLimitReached: Device limit reached. Remove a device first or contact support to increase your limit.
translations.userSettings.enterFingerprintHint: Enter the fingerprint from your new device
translations.userSettings.getFingerprintHint: Get this from: Flyto2 App > Settings > License > Copy Machine Fingerprint
translations.userSettings.noApiKeysDesc: Create an API key to access Flyto2 programmatically or integrate with external tools.
translations.userSettings.noLicensesDesc: Purchase a Pro Offline license to use Flyto2 without internet connection.
translations.userSettings.revokeApiKeyDesc: Are you sure you want to revoke "{name}"? This will immediately disable the key.
translations.userSettings.scopeOptions.executeDesc: Run workflows and access execution results
translations.userSettings.scopeOptions.writeDesc: Create and modify templates and workflows
translations.userSettings.subtitle: Manage your profile and account
translations.userSettings.title: Settings
translations.userSettings.transferLimitsDesc: You can transfer your license to a new device {count} more time(s) this year. Transfer limit resets on January 1st.
